tool_description: Collects and organizes evidence documents and data required for chargeback dispute responses.

chargeback_reason.description: Chargeback reason code requiring specific evidence types

date_range_start.description: Start date for evidence collection in ISO 8601 format

date_range_end.description: End date for evidence collection in ISO 8601 format

include_metadata.description: Whether to include document metadata and timestamps

error_messages: Evidence not found: Some requested evidence types are not available for this transaction. Review available evidence types and adjust the request accordingly.
Invalid evidence type: One or more evidence_types are not recognized. Use valid evidence types like receipt, shipping_proof, authorization_proof, etc.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to collect evidence for this merchant or transaction. Verify merchant_id credentials and access rights.
Date range invalid: The date_range_start must be before date_range_end, and both must be valid ISO 8601 dates. Check the date format and logical ordering.
usage: Provide transaction_id, chargeback_reason, evidence_types array, and merchant_id to collect relevant dispute evidence. Optionally specify customer_id, date ranges, and metadata preferences.

evidence_package_id.description: Unique identifier for the collected evidence package

collected_evidence.description: List of successfully collected evidence document types

missing_evidence.description: List of requested evidence types that could not be found

evidence_strength.description: Assessment of evidence quality: strong, moderate, or weak

total_documents.description: Total number of evidence documents collected
